previewArticle.title: Netherlands vs. Chile: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group B Preview

recapArticle.title: Netherlands 2, Chile 0: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group B Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Simon Beckett
timelineItems.text: It may be 2am but looking forward to the Netherlands v Chile match, reckon Netherlands will shade it 2-1 #NEDvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gonzalo Jara (Chile).
Arjen Robben (Netherlands) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Femi & The Gang
timelineItems.text: It's been a cagey first few minutes from Sao Paulo as both teams clearly don't want to make an early mistake with so much at stake. #NEDvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jeremain Lens (Netherlands).
Francisco Silva (Chile) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Ian Stewart
timelineItems.text: #NEDvCHI nice to see a splash of Orange on a sunny July day. #marchingon #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Bowyay
timelineItems.text: Let's go Chile! Should be a cracker to decide group B, unfortunately Australia v Spain is relegated to side bae right now #NEDvCHI #AUSvESP

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Eduardo Vargas (Chile) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Eugenio Mena with a cross.

Alexis Sánchez (Chile) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Ujjwal
timelineItems.text: Lousy start. Get a grip lads! #NedVChi

timelineItems.name: UFA
timelineItems.text: #NED showing a physical style to start this #NEDvCHI game. They seem to have been instructed to weather the initial Chilean storm

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match  (Chile).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Foul by Jeremain Lens (Netherlands).
Francisco Silva (Chile) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Emily
timelineItems.text: Switching over to #NEDvCHI. Cuz it actually matters. Not in the grand scheme of the universe or anything, but to the World Cup now.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jeremain Lens (Netherlands).
Gary Medel (Chile) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: FCB News&Negativity
timelineItems.text: Let's do the traditional "watch two matches, miss everything of importance in both of them". #NEDvCHI #AUSvESP

timelineItems.name: The Football Vault
timelineItems.text: This could turn out to be an incredible game #NEDvCHI

timelineItems.desc:
Re-live the best moments from Netherlands vs. Chile final Group B match.

Catch all of MLSsoccer.com's World Cup coverage at www.mlssoccer.com/worldcup
timelineItems.title: World Cup in Pictures: Netherlands clinches top spot in Group B with win over Chile

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Neymar puts Brazil up 1-0 with the 100th goal of this #WorldCup.
